name: Gym Diary
longDescription: Gym Diary is a comprehensive workout tracking app designed to help fitness enthusiasts log their workouts, track progress, and stay motivated. With an intuitive interface and powerful features, it makes tracking your fitness journey effortless.

name: Expense Diary
description: App to track your budgets and expenses.
longDescription: Expense Diary is a personal finance management app that helps users track their spending, manage budgets, and gain insights into their financial habits. Simple yet powerful tools for better financial health.
highlights: Featured in App Store's 'New Apps We Love'

name: Easy Fast - Intermittent Fasting
longDescription: Easy Fast is an intermittent fasting companion that helps users maintain their fasting schedules with timers, progress tracking, and motivational features. Designed to make intermittent fasting simple and sustainable.

name: Five Task
description: Yet another To Do app. I promise its better
longDescription: Five Task is a minimalist productivity app based on the principle of focusing on just five important tasks per day. Clean design meets powerful functionality to help users stay focused and productive.
